entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
